name: LOLA LEONI - GOLD WITH STONES WATCH & BRACELET
description: This elegant and stylish gold plated watch features a multi coloured crystal set bazel and a matching bracelet. Presented in a signature Lola Leoni case.
short_description: This elegant and stylish gold plated watch features a multi coloured crystal set bazel and a matching bracelet. Presented in a signature Lola Leoni case.
